6// QueryMtl.h:
7// Defines the class interface for QueryMtl, implementing QueryImpl.
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_QUERYMTL_H_
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_QUERYMTL_H_
12
13#include "libANGLE/renderer/QueryImpl.h"
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_common.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_constants.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_resources.h"
17
18namespace rx
19{
20
21class ContextMtl;
22
23// The class represents offset(s) allocated in the visiblity buffer for an occlusion query.
24// See doc/OcclusionQuery.md.
25// An occlusion query might have more than one offsets allocated, but all of them must be adjacent
26// to each other. Multiple offsets typically allocated when the query is paused and resumed during
27// viewport clear emulation with draw operations. In such case, Metal doesn't allow an offset to
28// be reused in a render pass, hence multiple offsets will be allocated, and their values will
29// be accumulated.
30class VisibilityBufferOffsetsMtl
31{
32 public:
33 void clear() { mStartOffset = mNumOffsets = 0; }
34 bool empty() const { return mNumOffsets == 0; }
35 uint32_t size() const { return mNumOffsets; }
36
37 // Return last offset
38 uint32_t back() const
39 {
40 ASSERT(!empty());
41 return mStartOffset + (mNumOffsets - 1) * mtl::kOcclusionQueryResultSize;
42 }
43
44 uint32_t front() const
45 {
46 ASSERT(!empty());
47 return mStartOffset;
48 }
49
50 void setStartOffset(uint32_t offset)
51 {
52 ASSERT(empty());
53 mStartOffset = offset;
54 mNumOffsets = 1;
55 }
56 void addOffset()
57 {
58 ASSERT(!empty());
59 mNumOffsets++;
60 }
61
62 private:
63 uint32_t mStartOffset = 0;
64 uint32_t mNumOffsets = 0;
65};
66
67class QueryMtl : public QueryImpl
68{
69 public:
70 QueryMtl(gl::QueryType type);
71 ~QueryMtl() override;
72
73 void onDestroy(const gl::Context *context) override;
74
75 angle::Result begin(const gl::Context *context) override;
76 angle::Result end(const gl::Context *context) override;
77 angle::Result queryCounter(const gl::Context *context) override;
78 angle::Result getResult(const gl::Context *context, GLint *params) override;
79 angle::Result getResult(const gl::Context *context, GLuint *params) override;
80 angle::Result getResult(const gl::Context *context, GLint64 *params) override;
81 angle::Result getResult(const gl::Context *context, GLuint64 *params) override;
82 angle::Result isResultAvailable(const gl::Context *context, bool *available) override;
83
84 // Get allocated offsets in the render pass's occlusion query pool.
85 const VisibilityBufferOffsetsMtl &getAllocatedVisibilityOffsets() const
86 {
87 return mVisibilityBufferOffsets;
88 }
89 // Set first allocated offset in the render pass's occlusion query pool.
90 void setFirstAllocatedVisibilityOffset(uint32_t off)
91 {
92 mVisibilityBufferOffsets.setStartOffset(off);
93 }
94 // Add more offset allocated for the occlusion query
95 void addAllocatedVisibilityOffset() { mVisibilityBufferOffsets.addOffset(); }
96
97 void clearAllocatedVisibilityOffsets() { mVisibilityBufferOffsets.clear(); }
98 // Returns the buffer containing the final occlusion query result.
99 const mtl::BufferRef &getVisibilityResultBuffer() const { return mVisibilityResultBuffer; }
100 // Reset the occlusion query result stored in buffer to zero
101 void resetVisibilityResult(ContextMtl *contextMtl);
102 void onTransformFeedbackEnd(GLsizeiptr primitivesDrawn);
103
104 private:
105 template <typename T>
106 angle::Result waitAndGetResult(const gl::Context *context, T *params);
107
108 // List of offsets in the render pass's occlusion query pool buffer allocated for this query
109 VisibilityBufferOffsetsMtl mVisibilityBufferOffsets;
110 mtl::BufferRef mVisibilityResultBuffer;
111 // Used with TransformFeedbackPrimitivesWritten when transform feedback is emulated.
112 size_t mTransformFeedbackPrimitivesDrawn;
113
114 // TODO(jcunningham): currently only used for mTransformFeedbackPrimitivesDrawn
115 // but can be used for rest of results
116 uint64_t mCachedResult;
117 bool mCachedResultValid;
118};
119
120} // namespace rx
121
122#endif /* LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_QUERYMTL_H_ */
123
